app_short_description: Hands in Circuits. Friendship Forged in Bytes. Meet Your Machi.
about_us_description: Machi is an AI podcast app that allows human to AI interactions and AI to human interactions by voice or chat. With Machi, users can generate images and read text using advanced AI technology. We provide a platform where users can enjoy intelligent conversations with our AI technology in a natural and seamless way. Our app offers group chat features, allowing users to engage in meaningful discussions and share ideas with their friends.
